name: IBIZ Consulting Services
description: IT services and solutions, MS CRM/ERP
overview:
IBIZ Consulting Services (IBIZ) is a global consulting services company headquartered in Singapore.

IBIZ desires to deliver high quality and best-in-class business solutions for the customers at an affordable rate. Today, IBIZ has through strategic partnerships with industry stalwarts such as Microsoft, IBM, Citrix and QlikView.

IBIZ has been the top reseller for Microsoft by winning prestigious Microsoft Partner of the year award three times.

IBIZ provides a wide bandwidth of business solutions by leveraging domain and business expertise and via alliances with leading technology providers. IBIZ has a deep vertical-base with domain expertise in manufacturing, retail and distribution, chemical, engineering services, food and beverages, PSO, apparel and textile, government, financial services and so on.

IBIZ has a wide horizontal expertise, with its service offerings spanning enterprise application services, business and technology consulting, ERP, supply chain management, knowledge management services, mobility and RFID solutions and content management solutions. Packages solution includes Microsoft Dynamics NAV (Navision), AX (Axapta), MS CRM, QlikView, etc.

IBIZ has a team of experienced resource pool, industry experts and top-notch SMEs, who invests their skills and time in R&D and innovation. Mobility Dynamics Suite developed by IBIZ is the best example for the teamâ€™s thirst for innovation and growth.

IBIZ has a wide geographic spread with development centers spread across the APAC region (Singapore, Malaysia, India, Thailand, Hong Kong, China and Indonesia) and Partner locations across the globe. IBIZâ€™s strategic partnerships enable quick setting up of virtual offices or ODCs as per client requirements thus enabling wide local presence across the globe.
